Appendix

\startcontents

[sections] \printcontents[sections]l1

Appendix A Additional Related Works

We complement SectionÂ 1 by discussing a few additional related works as follows.

Client unavailability was also studied from the perspective of block-cyclic SGDÂ [6, 7], which trains multiple models each for a block (group) of clients with known identity and was analyzed for convex objectives. Different from those works, our goal is to train a single model without requiring block structure, and we focus on non-convex objectives that frequently arise in modern problems involving neural networks.

In the literature of SGD in the centralized setting, the effect of different ways of minibatch sampling has also been studied, such as IID sampling from an arbitrary distribution [11] and random reshuffling [13, 25]. However, the problem in FL is much more complex and needs to incorporate the diversity of different clientsâ€™ local objectives. Moreover, we focus on a unified framework that is more general than the special cases of IID sampling and random reshuffling.

FedAvg with two-sided learning rates has been studied in the literature [18, 36], where a global learning rate is applied to the updates at the end of each round, giving an improved convergence bound compared to using a single-sided learning rate. This is equivalent to our AlgorithmÂ 1 with P=1ğ‘ƒ1P=1 and the amplification factor Î·ğœ‚\eta being the global learning rate. We extend this setup by allowing any Pâ‰¥1ğ‘ƒ1P\geq 1. Moreover, most existing works including [18, 36] have only shown the benefit of two-sided learning rates in a theoretical setting; their experiments still uses a global learning rate of 1.01.01.0, which is equivalent to the case of a single-sided learning rate. Although some recent works have used different global learning rates in experiments, the best setting often remains to be choosing 1.01.01.0 as the global learning rate in the case of FedAvg [26, Table 8]. In contrast, we have verified the benefit of amplification in our experiments (SectionÂ 6), for scenarios with more challenging client participation patterns than existing works. The idea of amplification is also related to look-ahead algorithms [42, 31], which consider a two-agent setting, e.g., a server and a single client. Different from these works, we consider the unique challenges in federated learning with multiple arbitrarily participating clients, where the data is non-IID across clients.

It is also worth pointing out that our discussion related to waiting for all clients in SectionÂ 5 has some analogy to the comparison between local SGD and minibatch SGD [32, 33, 41]. Even when not considering the effect of partial participation, these existing works have only identified some specific classes of convex objectives where local SGD can be shown to have a better theoretical convergence rate than minibatch SGD. An improved theoretical approach to capture the fact that local SGD often outperforms minibatch SGD in practice, for a wide range of problems and objective functions (especially non-convex objectives), remains an interesting future direction.

Appendix B Additional Discussions

B.1 Why Does Amplification Help?

We give an illustrative example to explain why the use of amplification with Î·>1ğœ‚1\eta>1 generally improves the performance, as shown in both our theory and experiments. Consider a simple setting with N=3ğ‘3N=3 clients. Each client nğ‘›n has a local objective defined as Fnâ€‹(ğ±)=12â€‹â€–ğ±âˆ’ğ³nâ€–2subscriptğ¹ğ‘›ğ±12superscriptnormğ±subscriptğ³ğ‘›2F_{n}(\mathbf{x})=\frac{1}{2}\left\|\mathbf{x}-\mathbf{z}_{n}\right\|^{2} for some constant vector ğ³nâˆˆâ„msubscriptğ³ğ‘›superscriptâ„ğ‘š\mathbf{z}_{n}\in\mathbb{R}^{m}. It is evident that the true optimal solution that minimizes the global objective fâ€‹(ğ±)=16â€‹âˆ‘n=13â€–ğ±âˆ’ğ³nâ€–2ğ‘“ğ±16superscriptsubscriptğ‘›13superscriptnormğ±subscriptğ³ğ‘›2f(\mathbf{x})=\frac{1}{6}\sum_{n=1}^{3}\left\|\mathbf{x}-\mathbf{z}_{n}\right\|^{2} is ğ±âˆ—=13â€‹âˆ‘n=13ğ³nsuperscriptğ±13superscriptsubscriptğ‘›13subscriptğ³ğ‘›\mathbf{x}^{*}=\frac{1}{3}\sum_{n=1}^{3}\mathbf{z}_{n}, but we assume that this is not known to the system and we would like to solve this problem using AlgorithmÂ 1. In this specific example, we consider a two-dimensional space (i.e., m=2ğ‘š2m=2) and define ğ³1=(âˆ’1,0),ğ³2=(1,0),ğ³3=(0,3)formulae-sequencesubscriptğ³110formulae-sequencesubscriptğ³210subscriptğ³303\mathbf{z}_{1}=(-1,0),\mathbf{z}_{2}=(1,0),\mathbf{z}_{3}=(0,\sqrt{3}). We further assume that the three clients are available in a cyclic manner, so that in the first round, only client n=1ğ‘›1n=1 is available; in the second round, only client n=2ğ‘›2n=2 is available; in the third round, only client n=3ğ‘›3n=3 is available; then this cycle continues with client n=1ğ‘›1n=1 available in the fourth round, and so on. We plot the trajectory of how the model parameter ğ±ğ±\mathbf{x} changes from the initial value ğ±0subscriptğ±0\mathbf{x}_{0} to ğ±15subscriptğ±15\mathbf{x}_{15} that is obtained after T=15ğ‘‡15T=15 rounds. The initial parameter is set to ğ±0=(1,2)subscriptğ±012\mathbf{x}_{0}=(1,2) in this example. The plots of the trajectories with different choices of local learning rate Î³ğ›¾\gamma and amplification factor Î·ğœ‚\eta are shown in FiguresÂ B.1â€“B.2.

With the local objectives defined in this example, the local gradient can be directly computed as âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ±)=ğ±âˆ’ğ³nâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›ğ±ğ±subscriptğ³ğ‘›\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x})=\mathbf{x}-\mathbf{z}_{n}. Therefore, in the case of no amplification (i.e., Î·=1ğœ‚1\eta=1), the solution variable ğ±ğ±\mathbf{x} moves towards ğ³1subscriptğ³1\mathbf{z}_{1} in the first round when client n=1ğ‘›1n=1 is available; then, it moves towards ğ³2subscriptğ³2\mathbf{z}_{2} in the second round when client n=2ğ‘›2n=2 is available, and so on. As we see from FigureÂ B.1, this can lead to a pattern where ğ±ğ±\mathbf{x} cycles around the optimal solution ğ±âˆ—superscriptğ±\mathbf{x}^{*} but approaches ğ±âˆ—superscriptğ±\mathbf{x}^{*} only very slowly, especially when Î³ğ›¾\gamma is large. In the case of small Î³ğ›¾\gamma, this cyclic pattern is not apparent, but we can still see that ğ±ğ±\mathbf{x} moves towards different local optimal points (i.e., ğ³nsubscriptğ³ğ‘›\mathbf{z}_{n} for different nğ‘›n) in different rounds, and the overall convergence speed is slow. This leads to the following problem: regardless of whether we choose a large or small Î³ğ›¾\gamma, at the end of the 151515-th round, there is an apparent gap between ğ±15subscriptğ±15\mathbf{x}_{15} andÂ ğ±âˆ—superscriptğ±\mathbf{x}^{*}.

The advantage of amplification is that it increases the importance of the aggregated updates made by clients that participate in different rounds. In this specific example, a single clientâ€™s update direction may be towards its own local optimum, which can be different from the direction towards the global optimum. However, the accumulated updates by all the three clients over every three rounds will be more likely towards the global optimum (or a neighborhood of it). By amplifying such accumulated updates after every three rounds (i.e., P=3ğ‘ƒ3P=3), we can let the solution variable ğ±ğ±\mathbf{x} move much faster towards the true (global) optimum. This intuition is confirmed by the trajectories shown in FigureÂ B.2. Here, we note that the product of Î³ğ›¾\gamma and Î·ğœ‚\eta in the corresponding sub-figures of FiguresÂ B.1 and B.2 are equal. By keeping a small local learning rate Î³ğ›¾\gamma and amplifying the updates accumulated in every P=3ğ‘ƒ3P=3 rounds, we can converge to the optimal value ğ±âˆ—superscriptğ±\mathbf{x}^{*}, as shown in FigureÂ B.2.

Note that in practice, Pğ‘ƒP does not need to perfectly align with the â€œcycleâ€ of participation, as seen in FigureÂ 2 in SectionÂ 6 of the main paper.

B.2 Relating Different Participation Patterns to Practical FL Scenarios

In the following, we discuss some possible connections between practical FL application scenarios and the different participation patterns that are considered in our theoretical analysis.

The case of periodic shifts, which is often seen in practical cross-device FL scenarios, is mostly related to regularized participation. In this case, the clients participate equally over the entire period, but only a subset of clients from a specific population (and with a specific data distribution) may participate in each â€œperiodâ€ that includes a certain number of consecutive rounds. In practice, this â€œequal participationâ€ only needs to hold approximately, and our empirical results at the end of SectionÂ 6 show that our AlgorithmÂ 1 can still give good performance even if Pğ‘ƒP is less than the full cycle (period) of participation.

Among the stochastic participation patterns, ergodic is the most generic. Intuitively, it says that the participation weights of different clients are the same when averaged over a long enough time. This can represent a cross-device FL scenario, where the participation of each client at any time instance can be highly random, but the long-term average statistics of clients are the same. The case of strongly mixing participation includes the special case where the participation follows a Markov chain, i.e., if the client is currently unavailable, there is a certain (possibly small) probability that it will become available in the next round, and vice versa. This can also represent a cross-device FL setting, where the devices get connected and disconnected over time, and there is some randomness in the exact time it gets connected or disconnected. Finally, the case of independent participation may represent a cross-silo FL setting, where the reason for not participating in a certain round is not because the client is disconnected for an extended period of time, but rather because the client has some other higher-priority tasks to run so that it cannot participate in all rounds.

Appendix C Proofs

C.1 Preliminaries

The following inequalities are frequently used throughout our proofs. We will use them without further explanation.

From Jensenâ€™s inequality, for any ğ³mâˆˆâ„d,mâˆˆ{1,2,â€¦,M}formulae-sequencesubscriptğ³ğ‘šsuperscriptâ„ğ‘‘ğ‘š12â€¦ğ‘€\mathbf{z}_{m}\in\mathbb{R}^{d},m\in\{1,2,\ldots,M\}, we have

â€–1Mâ€‹âˆ‘m=1Mğ³mâ€–2superscriptnorm1ğ‘€superscriptsubscriptğ‘š1ğ‘€subscriptğ³ğ‘š2\displaystyle\left\|\frac{1}{M}\sum_{m=1}^{M}\mathbf{z}_{m}\right\|^{2} â‰¤1Mâ€‹âˆ‘m=1Mâ€–ğ³mâ€–2absent1ğ‘€superscriptsubscriptğ‘š1ğ‘€superscriptnormsubscriptğ³ğ‘š2\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{M}\sum_{m=1}^{M}\left\|\mathbf{z}_{m}\right\|^{2} (C.1)

which directly gives

â€–âˆ‘m=1Mğ³mâ€–2superscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘š1ğ‘€subscriptğ³ğ‘š2\displaystyle\left\|\sum_{m=1}^{M}\mathbf{z}_{m}\right\|^{2} â‰¤Mâ€‹âˆ‘m=1Mâ€–ğ³mâ€–2.absentğ‘€superscriptsubscriptğ‘š1ğ‘€superscriptnormsubscriptğ³ğ‘š2\displaystyle\leq M\sum_{m=1}^{M}\left\|\mathbf{z}_{m}\right\|^{2}. (C.2)

Peter-Paul inequality (also known as Youngâ€™s inequality) gives

âŸ¨ğ³1,ğ³2âŸ©â‰¤bâ€‹â€–ğ³1â€–22+â€–ğ³2â€–22â€‹bsubscriptğ³1subscriptğ³2ğ‘superscriptnormsubscriptğ³122superscriptnormsubscriptğ³222ğ‘\langle\mathbf{z}_{1},\mathbf{z}_{2}\rangle\leq\frac{b\left\|\mathbf{z}_{1}\right\|^{2}}{2}+\frac{\left\|\mathbf{z}_{2}\right\|^{2}}{2b} (C.3)

for any b>0ğ‘0b>0 and any ğ³1,ğ³2âˆˆâ„dsubscriptğ³1subscriptğ³2superscriptâ„ğ‘‘\mathbf{z}_{1},\mathbf{z}_{2}\in\mathbb{R}^{d}. Hence, we also have

â€–ğ³1+ğ³2â€–2â‰¤(1+b)â€‹â€–ğ³1â€–2+(1+1b)â€‹â€–ğ³2â€–2.superscriptnormsubscriptğ³1subscriptğ³221ğ‘superscriptnormsubscriptğ³1211ğ‘superscriptnormsubscriptğ³22\left\|\mathbf{z}_{1}+\mathbf{z}_{2}\right\|^{2}\leq(1+b)\left\|\mathbf{z}_{1}\right\|^{2}+\left(1+\frac{1}{b}\right)\left\|\mathbf{z}_{2}\right\|^{2}. (C.4)

Throughout the analysis, we use the short-hand notation ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â‹…]\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\cdot\right] to denote ğ”¼[â‹…|ğ’¬]\mathbb{E}\left[\cdot|\mathcal{Q}\right].

In addition, we use the notations in AlgorithmÂ 1 and AssumptionsÂ 1, 2, and \NoHyper3â€™\endNoHyper.

C.2 Lemmas

Lemma C.1.

When Î³â‰¤112â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pğ›¾112ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒ\gamma\leq\frac{1}{12LIP}, we have

âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]â‰¤3â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)).\displaystyle\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]\leq 3I\gamma^{2}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right). (C.5)
Proof.

Note that

âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,i+1nâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,i+1nâ€²â€–2]\displaystyle\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i+1}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i+1}\right\|^{2}\right]
=âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’Î³â€‹ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²âˆ’Î³â€‹ğ nâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²))â€–2]\displaystyle=\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\gamma\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}-\gamma\mathbf{g}_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}))\right\|^{2}\right]
=(a)â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’Î³â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²âˆ’Î³â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²))â€–2]\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\gamma\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}-\gamma\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}))\right\|^{2}\right]
+âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–Î³â€‹(ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in))âˆ’Î³â€‹âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹(ğ nâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²))â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\gamma\left(\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right)-\gamma\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\left(\mathbf{g}_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i})\right)\right\|^{2}\right]
=âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’Î³â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²âˆ’Î³â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²))â€–2]\displaystyle=\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\gamma\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}-\gamma\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}))\right\|^{2}\right]
+âˆ‘n=1Nqtnğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ’Î³âˆ‘nâ€²âˆˆ{1,â€¦,N}âˆ–{n}qtnâ€²(ğ nâ€²(ğ²t,inâ€²)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€²(ğ²t,inâ€²))\displaystyle\quad+\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\Bigg{[}\Bigg{\|}-\gamma\sum_{n^{\prime}\in\{1,\ldots,N\}\setminus\{n\}}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\left(\mathbf{g}_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i})\right)
âˆ’Î³(qtnâˆ’1)(ğ n(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fn(ğ²t,in))âˆ¥2]\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad-\gamma\left(q_{t}^{n}-1\right)\left(\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right)\Bigg{\|}^{2}\Bigg{]}
â‰¤(b)â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’Î³â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²âˆ’Î³â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²))â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\gamma\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}-\gamma\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}))\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\!\left(1\!-\!\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)

â‰¤(1+12â€‹Iâˆ’1)â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]\displaystyle\leq\left(1+\frac{1}{2I-1}\right)\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]
+2IÎ³2âˆ‘n=1Nqtnğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‡Fn(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fn(âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²ğ²t,inâ€²â€²)+âˆ‡Fn(âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²ğ²t,inâ€²â€²)\displaystyle\quad+2I\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right)+\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right)\right.\right.
âˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€²)+âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€²)superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²âˆ‡subscriptğ¹superscriptğ‘›â€²superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²â€²subscriptsuperscriptğ²superscriptğ‘›â€²â€²ğ‘¡ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²âˆ‡subscriptğ¹superscriptğ‘›â€²superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²â€²subscriptsuperscriptğ²superscriptğ‘›â€²â€²ğ‘¡ğ‘–\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right)+\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right)

+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\quad+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)
â‰¤(1+12â€‹Iâˆ’1)â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]\displaystyle\leq\left(1+\frac{1}{2I-1}\right)\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]
+6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€²)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+6I\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right)\right\|^{2}\right]
+6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€²)âˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€²)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+6I\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right)-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right)\right\|^{2}\right]
+6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€²)âˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€²â€‹(ğ²t,inâ€²)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+6I\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right)-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\nabla F_{n^{\prime}}(\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\quad+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)
â‰¤(c)â€‹(1+12â€‹Iâˆ’1)â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq}\left(1+\frac{1}{2I-1}\right)\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]
+6â€‹Iâ€‹L2â€‹Î³2â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€²â€–2]+6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î½~2\displaystyle\quad+6IL^{2}\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]+6I\gamma^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}
+6â€‹Iâ€‹L2â€‹Î³2â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâ€²âˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²â€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€²â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)\displaystyle\quad+6IL^{2}\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)
=(d)â€‹(1+12â€‹Iâˆ’1+12â€‹Iâ€‹L2â€‹Î³2)â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]\displaystyle\overset{(d)}{=}\left(1+\frac{1}{2I-1}+12IL^{2}\gamma^{2}\right)\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]
+6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î½~2+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)6ğ¼superscriptğ›¾2superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\quad+6I\gamma^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)
â‰¤(e)â€‹(1+712â€‹(Iâˆ’12))â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]+6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î½~2+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2).\displaystyle\overset{(e)}{\leq}\left(1+\frac{7}{12\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]+6I\gamma^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right). (C.6)

In the above, (a)ğ‘(a) is due to ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ³â€–2]=â€–ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[ğ³]â€–2+ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ³âˆ’ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[ğ³]â€–2]\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{z}\right\|^{2}\right]=\left\|\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\mathbf{z}\right]\right\|^{2}+\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{z}-\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\mathbf{z}\right]\right\|^{2}\right]; (b)ğ‘(b) is because the stochastic gradient noise is independent across clients, the variance of the sum of independent random variables is equal to the sum of the variance and Varâ€‹(aâ€‹ğ³)=a2â€‹Varâ€‹(ğ³)Varğ‘ğ³superscriptğ‘2Varğ³\mathrm{Var}(a\mathbf{z})=a^{2}\mathrm{Var}(\mathbf{z}) where Varâ€‹(ğ³):=ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ³âˆ’ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[ğ³]â€–2]\mathrm{Var}(\mathbf{z}):=\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{z}-\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\mathbf{z}\right]\right\|^{2}\right], and we also use the definition of Ïƒ2superscriptğœ2\sigma^{2} in AssumptionÂ 2 while noting the law of total expectation as well as

âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹[âˆ‘nâ€²âˆˆ{1,â€¦,N}âˆ–{n}(qtnâ€²)2+(1âˆ’qtn)2]=âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹[âˆ‘nâ€²=1N(qtnâ€²)2âˆ’(qtn)2+(1âˆ’qtn)2]superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›delimited-[]subscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1â€¦ğ‘ğ‘›superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²2superscript1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²2superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2superscript1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\left[\sum_{n^{\prime}\in\{1,\ldots,N\}\setminus\{n\}}(q_{t}^{n^{\prime}})^{2}+(1-q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right]=\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\left[\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n^{\prime}})^{2}-(q_{t}^{n})^{2}+(1-q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right]
=âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2+âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹(1âˆ’2â€‹qtn)=âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2+âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâˆ’2â€‹âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2=1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2;absentsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›12superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle=\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}+\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}(1-2q_{t}^{n})=\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}+\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}-2\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}=1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2};

(c)ğ‘(c) uses smoothness in the second term, the definition of Î½~~ğœˆ\tilde{\nu} in the third term, and Jensenâ€™s inequality followed by smoothness in the fourth term, while noting that âˆ‘n=1Nqtn=1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›1\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}=1; (d)ğ‘‘(d) combines the second and fourth terms in the above line, while (again) noting that âˆ‘n=1Nqtn=1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›1\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}=1; (e)ğ‘’(e) is because

12â€‹Iâˆ’1+12â€‹Iâ€‹L2â€‹Î³212ğ¼112ğ¼superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ›¾2\displaystyle\frac{1}{2I-1}+12IL^{2}\gamma^{2} â‰¤12â€‹Iâˆ’1+112â€‹Iâ‰¤12â€‹(Iâˆ’12)+112â€‹(Iâˆ’12)=712â€‹(Iâˆ’12)absent12ğ¼1112ğ¼12ğ¼12112ğ¼12712ğ¼12\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{2I-1}+\frac{1}{12I}\leq\frac{1}{2\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}+\frac{1}{12\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}=\frac{7}{12\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}

where the first inequality is due to Î³â‰¤112â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pâ‰¤112â€‹Lâ€‹Iğ›¾112ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒ112ğ¿ğ¼\gamma\leq\frac{1}{12LIP}\leq\frac{1}{12LI} since Pâ‰¥1ğ‘ƒ1P\geq 1.

For i=0ğ‘–0i=0, we note that

âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,0nâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,0nâ€²â€–2]=0\displaystyle\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,0}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,0}\right\|^{2}\right]=0 (C.7)

because ğ²t,0n=ğ±tsubscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡0subscriptğ±ğ‘¡\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,0}=\mathbf{x}_{t} for all nğ‘›n as specified in AlgorithmÂ 1, and âˆ‘n=1Nqtn=1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›1\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}=1.

By combining (C.6) and (C.7) and unrolling the recursion, we have for any iğ‘–i that

âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]\displaystyle\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1(1+712â€‹(Iâˆ’12))iâ€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î½~2+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))absentsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1superscript1712ğ¼12ğ‘–6ğ¼superscriptğ›¾2superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\leq\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\left(1+\frac{7}{12\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{i}\left(6I\gamma^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
=(a)â€‹[(1+712â€‹(Iâˆ’12))Iâˆ’1]â‹…12â€‹(Iâˆ’12)7â‹…(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î½~2+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))â‹…ğ‘delimited-[]superscript1712ğ¼12ğ¼112ğ¼1276ğ¼superscriptğ›¾2superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=}\left[\left(1+\frac{7}{12\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{I}-1\right]\cdot\frac{12\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}{7}\cdot\left(6I\gamma^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
=[(1+712â€‹(Iâˆ’12))Iâˆ’12â€‹(1+712â€‹(Iâˆ’12))12âˆ’1]â‹…12â€‹(Iâˆ’12)7â‹…(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î½~2+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))absentâ‹…delimited-[]superscript1712ğ¼12ğ¼12superscript1712ğ¼1212112ğ¼1276ğ¼superscriptğ›¾2superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle=\left[\!\left(\!1\!+\!\frac{7}{12\!\left(I\!-\!\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{\!\!I-\frac{1}{2}}\!\left(\!1\!+\!\frac{7}{12\!\left(I\!-\!\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{\!\!\frac{1}{2}}\!\!-\!1\right]\!\cdot\!\frac{12\left(I\!-\!\frac{1}{2}\right)}{7}\!\cdot\!\left(\!6I\gamma^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}\!+\!\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1\!-\!\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\!\right)
â‰¤(b)â€‹[e712â‹…136âˆ’1]â‹…12â€‹(Iâˆ’12)7â‹…(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î½~2+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))â‹…ğ‘delimited-[]â‹…superscriptğ‘’712136112ğ¼1276ğ¼superscriptğ›¾2superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq}\left[e^{\frac{7}{12}}\cdot\sqrt{\frac{13}{6}}-1\right]\cdot\frac{12\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}{7}\cdot\left(6I\gamma^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
â‰¤(c)â€‹3â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))ğ‘3ğ¼superscriptğ›¾26ğ¼superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq}3I\gamma^{2}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)

where (a)ğ‘(a) uses the expression of the sum of geometric progression series; (b)ğ‘(b) uses (1+x)1xâ‰¤esuperscript1ğ‘¥1ğ‘¥ğ‘’\left(1+x\right)^{\frac{1}{x}}\leq e and Iâ‰¥1ğ¼1I\geq 1 hence (1+712â€‹(Iâˆ’12))12â‰¤(1+76)12=136superscript1712ğ¼1212superscript17612136\left(1+\frac{7}{12\left(I-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}\leq\left(1+\frac{7}{6}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}=\sqrt{\frac{13}{6}}; (c)ğ‘(c) is because [e712â‹…136âˆ’1]â€‹127â‰¤3delimited-[]â‹…superscriptğ‘’71213611273\left[e^{\frac{7}{12}}\cdot\sqrt{\frac{13}{6}}-1\right]\frac{12}{7}\leq 3 and Iâˆ’12â‰¤Iğ¼12ğ¼I-\frac{1}{2}\leq I. âˆ

Lemma C.2.

When Î³â‰¤112â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pğ›¾112ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒ\gamma\leq\frac{1}{12LIP}, we have

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤3â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹Î½~2+24â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹Î²~2+24â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]\displaystyle\leq 3\gamma^{2}I^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]
+3â€‹Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+16â€‹Pâ€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)]3superscriptğ›¾2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğœ2delimited-[]superscriptğœŒ216ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\quad+3\gamma^{2}IP\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right] (C.8)

for t0â‰¤tâ‰¤t0+Pâˆ’1subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1t_{0}\leq t\leq t_{0}+P-1.

Proof.

We have

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,i+1nâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i+1}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
=ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹(ğ²t,inâˆ’Î³â€‹ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in))âˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\left(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\gamma\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right)-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
=ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹(ğ²t,inâˆ’Î³â€‹âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in))âˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]+ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹Î³â€‹(ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in))â€–2]\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\left(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\gamma\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right)-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]+\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\gamma\left(\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right)\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‘n=1Nqtn[ğ²t,inâˆ’Î³(âˆ‡Fn(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fn(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²ğ²t,inâ€²)+âˆ‡Fn(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²ğ²t,inâ€²)\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\left[\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\gamma\left(\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)+\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)\right.\right.\right.\right.
âˆ’âˆ‡Fn(ğ±t0)+âˆ‡Fn(ğ±t0)âˆ’âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)+âˆ‡f(ğ±t0))]âˆ’ğ±t0âˆ¥2]+Î³2Ï2Ïƒ2\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})+\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})+\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\Bigg{)}\Bigg{]}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\Bigg{\|}^{2}\Bigg{]}+\gamma^{2}\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}
â‰¤(1+12â€‹Iâ€‹Pâˆ’1)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\leq\left(1+\frac{1}{2IP-1}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹[âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²)]â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\left[\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)\right]\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹[âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ±t0)]â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\left[\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right]\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹[âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ±t0)âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\left[\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right]\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ2\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}
â‰¤(a)â€‹(1+12â€‹Iâ€‹Pâˆ’1)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq}\left(1+\frac{1}{2IP-1}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î²~2+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ2\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}
â‰¤(b)â€‹(1+12â€‹Iâ€‹Pâˆ’1)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq}\left(1+\frac{1}{2IP-1}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹L2â€‹Î³2â€‹âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+8IPL^{2}\gamma^{2}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹L2â€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²âˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+8IPL^{2}\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î²~2+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ2\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}
â‰¤(c)â€‹(1+12â€‹Iâ€‹Pâˆ’1+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹L2â€‹Î³2)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq}\left(1+\frac{1}{2IP-1}+8IPL^{2}\gamma^{2}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
+24â€‹I2â€‹Pâ€‹L2â€‹Î³4â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))24superscriptğ¼2ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğ›¾46ğ¼superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\quad+24I^{2}PL^{2}\gamma^{4}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î²~2+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ2\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}
â‰¤(d)â€‹(1+59â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12))â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]+144â€‹Î³4â€‹I3â€‹Pâ€‹L2â€‹Î½~2\displaystyle\overset{(d)}{\leq}\left(1+\frac{5}{9\left(IP-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]+144\gamma^{4}I^{3}PL^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î²~2+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+24â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹Pâ€‹L2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)]\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}PL^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]
â‰¤(e)â€‹(1+59â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12))â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2P\displaystyle\overset{(e)}{\leq}\left(1+\frac{5}{9\left(IP-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]+\frac{\gamma^{2}I\tilde{\nu}^{2}}{P}
+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î²~2+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+16â€‹Pâ€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)].\displaystyle\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]. (C.9)

In the above, the stochastic gradient variance decomposition is the same as the proof of LemmaÂ C.1, while noting that âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2â‰¤Ï2superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2superscriptğœŒ2\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\leq\rho^{2}; (a)ğ‘(a) uses Jensenâ€™s inequality, the definition of Î²~2superscript~ğ›½2\tilde{\beta}^{2}, and âˆ‘n=1Nqtn=1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›1\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}=1; (b)ğ‘(b) uses Lğ¿L-smoothness; (c)ğ‘(c) is from LemmaÂ C.1; (d)ğ‘‘(d) is due to

12â€‹Iâ€‹Pâˆ’1+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹L2â€‹Î³212ğ¼ğ‘ƒ18ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğ¿2superscriptğ›¾2\displaystyle\frac{1}{2IP-1}+8IPL^{2}\gamma^{2} â‰¤12â€‹Iâ€‹Pâˆ’1+118â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ‰¤12â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12)+118â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12)=59â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12)absent12ğ¼ğ‘ƒ1118ğ¼ğ‘ƒ12ğ¼ğ‘ƒ12118ğ¼ğ‘ƒ1259ğ¼ğ‘ƒ12\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{2IP-1}+\frac{1}{18IP}\leq\frac{1}{2\left(IP-\frac{1}{2}\right)}+\frac{1}{18\left(IP-\frac{1}{2}\right)}=\frac{5}{9\left(IP-\frac{1}{2}\right)}

where the first inequality is due to Î³â‰¤112â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pğ›¾112ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒ\gamma\leq\frac{1}{12LIP}; (e)ğ‘’(e) uses Î³â‰¤112â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pğ›¾112ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒ\gamma\leq\frac{1}{12LIP} in the second and last terms.

We note that, for t0â‰¤tâ‰¤t0+Pâˆ’2subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ2t_{0}\leq t\leq t_{0}+P-2, we have

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqt+1nâ€‹ğ²t+1,0nâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t+1}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t+1,0}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
=ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqt+1nâ€‹ğ±t+1âˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]=ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ±t+1âˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]=ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,Inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t+1}^{n}\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]=\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{x}_{t+1}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]=\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,I}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right] (C.10)

because ğ²t,0n=ğ±tsubscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡0subscriptğ±ğ‘¡\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,0}=\mathbf{x}_{t} for all nğ‘›n as specified in AlgorithmÂ 1, and âˆ‘n=1Nqtn=1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›1\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}=1 hence ğ±t+1=ğ±t+âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹(ğ²t,Inâˆ’ğ±t)=âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,Insubscriptğ±ğ‘¡1subscriptğ±ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ²ğ‘¡ğ¼ğ‘›subscriptğ±ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ²ğ‘¡ğ¼ğ‘›\mathbf{x}_{t+1}=\mathbf{x}_{t}+\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}(\mathbf{y}_{t,I}^{n}-\mathbf{x}_{t})=\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}_{t,I}^{n} according to AlgorithmÂ 1.

Therefore, the same recursion in (C.9) also holds between t+1ğ‘¡1t+1 and tğ‘¡t, i.e.,

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqt+1nâ€‹ğ²t+1,1nâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t+1}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t+1,1}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤(1+59â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12))â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,Inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\leq\left(1+\frac{5}{9\left(IP-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,I}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
+Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2P+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î²~2+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+16â€‹Pâ€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)].\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}I\tilde{\nu}^{2}}{P}+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]. (C.11)

When t=t0ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0t=t_{0} and i=0ğ‘–0i=0, note that

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqt0nâ€‹ğ²t0,0nâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]=0\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t_{0}}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t_{0},0}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]=0 (C.12)

because ğ²t0,0n=ğ±t0subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›subscriptğ‘¡00subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡0\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t_{0},0}=\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}} for all nğ‘›n as specified in AlgorithmÂ 1, and âˆ‘n=1Nqtn=1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›1\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}=1.

We combine (C.9), (C.11), and (C.12). Since t0â‰¤tâ‰¤t0+Pâˆ’1subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1t_{0}\leq t\leq t_{0}+P-1, unrolling the recursion gives

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹ğ²t,inâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤âˆ‘Îº=0Iâ€‹Pâˆ’1(1+59â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12))Îº(Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2P+8IPÎ³2Î²~2+8IPÎ³2ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)âˆ¥2]\displaystyle\leq\sum_{\kappa=0}^{IP-1}\left(1+\frac{5}{9\left(IP-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{\kappa}\Bigg{(}\frac{\gamma^{2}I\tilde{\nu}^{2}}{P}+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]
+Î³2Ïƒ2[Ï2+16â€‹P(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\Bigg{)}
=[(1+59â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12))Iâ€‹Pâˆ’1]â‹…9â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12)5â‹…(Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2P+8IPÎ³2Î²~2+8IPÎ³2ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)âˆ¥2]\displaystyle=\left[\!\left(1+\frac{5}{9\left(IP\!-\!\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{IP}\!\!\!-1\right]\!\cdot\frac{9\left(IP\!-\!\frac{1}{2}\right)}{5}\cdot\Bigg{(}\frac{\gamma^{2}I\tilde{\nu}^{2}}{P}+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]
+Î³2Ïƒ2[Ï2+16â€‹P(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\Bigg{)}
=[(1+59â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12))Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12(1+59â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12))12âˆ’1]â‹…9â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12)5â‹…(Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2P+8IPÎ³2Î²~2\displaystyle=\left[\!\left(1+\frac{5}{9\left(IP\!-\!\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{\!\!IP-\frac{1}{2}}\left(1+\frac{5}{9\left(IP-\frac{1}{2}\right)}\right)^{\!\!\frac{1}{2}}-1\right]\cdot\frac{9\left(IP\!-\!\frac{1}{2}\right)}{5}\cdot\Bigg{(}\frac{\gamma^{2}I\tilde{\nu}^{2}}{P}+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}
+8IPÎ³2ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)âˆ¥2]+Î³2Ïƒ2[Ï2+16â€‹P(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\Bigg{)}
â‰¤[e59â‹…199âˆ’1]â‹…9â€‹(Iâ€‹Pâˆ’12)5â‹…(Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2P+8IPÎ³2Î²~2+8IPÎ³2ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)âˆ¥2]\displaystyle\leq\left[e^{\frac{5}{9}}\!\cdot\!\sqrt{\frac{19}{9}}-1\right]\cdot\frac{9\left(IP\!-\!\frac{1}{2}\right)}{5}\cdot\Bigg{(}\frac{\gamma^{2}I\tilde{\nu}^{2}}{P}+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]
+Î³2Ïƒ2[Ï2+16â€‹P(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1\!-\!\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\Bigg{)}
â‰¤3â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹(Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2P+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹Î²~2+8â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î³2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+16â€‹Pâ€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])\displaystyle\leq 3IP\left(\frac{\gamma^{2}I\tilde{\nu}^{2}}{P}+8IP\gamma^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+8IP\gamma^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]+\gamma^{2}\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\!\left(1\!-\!\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\!\right]\!\right)
â‰¤3â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹Î½~2+24â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹Î²~2+24â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]+3â€‹Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+16â€‹Pâ€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)]\displaystyle\leq 3\gamma^{2}I^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}\!+\!24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}\!+\!24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]\!+\!3\gamma^{2}IP\sigma^{2}\!\left[\rho^{2}\!+\!\frac{1}{6P}\!\left(\!1\!-\!\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\!\right)\!\right]

where the rationale behind the steps is similar to the proof of LemmaÂ C.1. âˆ

C.3 Proof of TheoremÂ 3.1

Consider t0=kâ€‹Psubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘˜ğ‘ƒ{t_{0}}=kP for k=0,1,2,â€¦ğ‘˜012â€¦k=0,1,2,....

Due to smoothness,

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0+P)]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}+P})\right]
â‰¤fâ€‹(ğ±t0)+ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),ğ±t0+Pâˆ’ğ±t0âŸ©]+L2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[â€–ğ±t0+Pâˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\leq f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})+\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\left\langle\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}+P}-\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}\right\rangle\right]+\frac{L}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}+P}-\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤fâ€‹(ğ±t0)âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)]âŸ©\displaystyle\leq f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})-\gamma\eta\left\langle\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right]\right\rangle
+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹L2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}L}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
=(a)â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±t0)âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ”¼â€‹[ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)|ğ’¬,ğ²t,in,ğ±t0]]âŸ©\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=}f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})-\gamma\eta\left\langle\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\big{|}\mathcal{Q},\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i},\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}\right]\right]\right\rangle
+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹L2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}L}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
=(b)â€‹fâ€‹(ğ±t0)âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)]âŸ©\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{=}f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})-\gamma\eta\left\langle\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right]\right\rangle
+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹L2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}L}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]

where ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬,t0â€‹[ğ³]\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q},{t_{0}}}\left[\mathbf{z}\right] is a short-hand notation for ğ”¼â€‹[ğ³|ğ’¬,ğ±t0]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalğ³ğ’¬subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡0\mathbb{E}\left[\mathbf{z}\big{|}\mathcal{Q},\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}\right]; (a)ğ‘(a) is due to the law of total expectation, where the expectation is taken over ğ²t,insubscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}; (b)ğ‘(b) is due to the unbiasedness and independence of stochastic gradients. In other parts of the proof, we may use the law of total expectation in a similar way without explanation.

Taking expectation on both sides over ğ±t0subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡0\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}}, we obtain

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0+P)]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}+P})\right] â‰¤ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]âˆ’ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[Î³â€‹Î·â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âŸ©]\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\gamma\eta\left\langle\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\rangle\right]
+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹L2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2].\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}L}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]. (C.13)

Consider the second term in (C.13),

âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âŸ©ğ›¾ğœ‚âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡0superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–\displaystyle-\gamma\eta\left\langle\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\rangle
=âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·Iâ€‹Pâ€‹âŸ¨Iâ€‹Pâ€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âŸ©absentğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒğ¼ğ‘ƒâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡0superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–\displaystyle=-\frac{\gamma\eta}{IP}\left\langle IP\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\rangle
=(a)â€‹Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’Iâ€‹Pâ€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2ğ‘ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ¼ğ‘ƒâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=}\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-IP\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}
âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒ2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\quad\quad-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}
=Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1[âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]â€–2absentğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1delimited-[]âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02\displaystyle=\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\left[\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]\right\|^{2}
âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒ2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\quad\quad-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}
=Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâˆ¥âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1[âˆ‡Fn(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fn(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²ğ²t,inâ€²)+âˆ‡Fn(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²ğ²t,inâ€²)\displaystyle=\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\Bigg{\|}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\Bigg{[}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)+\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)
âˆ’âˆ‡Fn(ğ±t0)+âˆ‡Fn(ğ±t0)âˆ’âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)]âˆ¥2\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})+\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\Bigg{]}\Bigg{\|}^{2}
âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒ2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\quad\quad-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}
â‰¤(b)â€‹3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1[âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²)]â€–2ğ‘3ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1delimited-[]âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²subscriptsuperscriptğ²superscriptğ‘›â€²ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq}\frac{3\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\left[\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)\right]\right\|^{2}
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1[âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ±t0)]â€–23ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1delimited-[]âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²subscriptsuperscriptğ²superscriptğ‘›â€²ğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\left[\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]\right\|^{2}
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1[âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ±t0)âˆ’âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]â€–23ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1delimited-[]âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡0âˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\left[\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})-\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]\right\|^{2}
âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒ2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\quad\quad-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}
â‰¤(c)â€‹3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nâˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1qtnâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²)â€–2ğ‘3ğ›¾ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²subscriptsuperscriptğ²superscriptğ‘›â€²ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq}\frac{3\gamma\eta}{2}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}q_{t}^{n}\left\|\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)\right\|^{2}
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nâˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1qtnâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–23ğ›¾ğœ‚2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²subscriptsuperscriptğ²superscriptğ‘›â€²ğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta}{2}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}q_{t}^{n}\left\|\nabla F_{n}\left(\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right)-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–23ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscript~ğ›¿2ğ‘ƒ2ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒ2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}
â‰¤3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L22â€‹âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nâˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1qtnâ€‹â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2absent3ğ›¾ğœ‚superscriptğ¿22superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptnormsubscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²subscriptsuperscriptğ²superscriptğ‘›â€²ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\leq\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}}{2}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}q_{t}^{n}\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L22â€‹âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1â€–âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²âˆ’ğ±t0â€–23ğ›¾ğœ‚superscriptğ¿22superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1superscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğ‘›â€²1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘›â€²subscriptsuperscriptğ²superscriptğ‘›â€²ğ‘¡ğ‘–subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}}{2}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\left\|\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}\right\|^{2}
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–23ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscript~ğ›¿2ğ‘ƒ2ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒ2superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“subscriptğ±subscriptğ‘¡02ğ›¾ğœ‚2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼1âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘›subscriptsuperscriptğ²ğ‘›ğ‘¡ğ‘–2\displaystyle\quad\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}

where (a)ğ‘(a) uses âˆ’âŸ¨ğš,ğ›âŸ©=12â€‹(â€–ğšâˆ’ğ›â€–2âˆ’â€–ğšâ€–2âˆ’â€–ğ›â€–2)ğšğ›12superscriptnormğšğ›2superscriptnormğš2superscriptnormğ›2-\left\langle\mathbf{a},\mathbf{b}\right\rangle=\frac{1}{2}(\left\|\mathbf{a}-\mathbf{b}\right\|^{2}-\left\|\mathbf{a}\right\|^{2}-\left\|\mathbf{b}\right\|^{2}); (b)ğ‘(b) uses Jensenâ€™s inequality in the first term; (c)ğ‘(c) uses Jensenâ€™s inequality in the first two terms and the definition of Î´~2â€‹(P)superscript~ğ›¿2ğ‘ƒ\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P) in the third term.

Hence,

âˆ’ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[Î³â€‹Î·â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âŸ©]\displaystyle-\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\gamma\eta\left\langle\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\rangle\right]
â‰¤3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L22â€‹âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nâˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1qtnâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ²t,inâˆ’âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²â€–2]\displaystyle\leq\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}}{2}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}q_{t}^{n}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i}-\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}\right\|^{2}\right]
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L22â€‹âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘nâ€²=1Nqtnâ€²â€‹ğ²t,inâ€²âˆ’ğ±t0â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}}{2}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{n^{\prime}=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n^{\prime}}\mathbf{y}^{n^{\prime}}_{t,i}-\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}\right\|^{2}\right]
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}\right]-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤(a)â€‹3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L22â€‹âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’13â€‹Iâ€‹Î³2â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))ğ‘3ğ›¾ğœ‚superscriptğ¿22superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡0subscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘–0ğ¼13ğ¼superscriptğ›¾26ğ¼superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq}\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}}{2}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}3I\gamma^{2}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L22âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1(3Î³2I2Î½~2+24Î³2I2P2Î²~2+24Î³2I2P2ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)âˆ¥2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}}{2}\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\Bigg{(}3\gamma^{2}I^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]
+3Î³2IPÏƒ2[Ï2+16â€‹P(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad+3\gamma^{2}IP\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}\!+\!\frac{1}{6P}\left(1\!-\!\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\Bigg{)}
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}\right]-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
=9â€‹Î³3â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))absent9superscriptğ›¾3ğœ‚superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¼2ğ‘ƒ26ğ¼superscript~ğœˆ2superscriptğœ21superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle=\frac{9\gamma^{3}\eta L^{2}I^{2}P}{2}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹Iâ€‹P2(3Î³2I2Î½~2+24Î³2I2P2Î²~2+24Î³2I2P2ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)âˆ¥2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}IP}{2}\Bigg{(}3\gamma^{2}I^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]
+3Î³2IPÏƒ2[Ï2+16â€‹P(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad+3\gamma^{2}IP\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\Bigg{)}
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}\right]-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right] (C.14)

where (a)ğ‘(a) uses LemmasÂ C.1 and C.2.

Note also that

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
=(a)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
+ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1[ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)]â€–2]\displaystyle\quad\quad+\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\left[\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right]\right\|^{2}\right]
=(b)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{=}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
+âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2â€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âˆ’âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad\quad+\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}\left(q_{t}^{n}\right)^{2}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})-\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤(c)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]+Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ2\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]+IP\rho^{2}\sigma^{2} (C.15)

where (a)ğ‘(a) uses ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ³â€–2]=â€–ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[ğ³]â€–2+ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ³âˆ’ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[ğ³]â€–2]\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{z}\right\|^{2}\right]=\left\|\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\mathbf{z}\right]\right\|^{2}+\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{z}-\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\mathbf{z}\right]\right\|^{2}\right]; (b)ğ‘(b) is because the variance of the sum of independent random variables is equal to the sum of the variance and Varâ€‹(aâ€‹ğ³)=a2â€‹Varâ€‹(ğ³)Varğ‘ğ³superscriptğ‘2Varğ³\mathrm{Var}(a\mathbf{z})=a^{2}\mathrm{Var}(\mathbf{z}) where Varâ€‹(ğ³):=ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–ğ³âˆ’ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[ğ³]â€–2]\mathrm{Var}(\mathbf{z}):=\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\mathbf{z}-\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\mathbf{z}\right]\right\|^{2}\right]; (c)ğ‘(c) uses the definitions of Ïƒ2superscriptğœ2\sigma^{2} and Ï2superscriptğœŒ2\rho^{2}.

Plugging (C.14) and (C.15) back into (C.13), we get

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0+P)]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}+P})\right]
â‰¤ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]âˆ’ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[Î³â€‹Î·â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0),âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)âŸ©]\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\gamma\eta\left\langle\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}}),\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\rangle\right]
+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹L2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1ğ nâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}L}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\mathbf{g}_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]+9â€‹Î³3â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]+\frac{9\gamma^{3}\eta L^{2}I^{2}P}{2}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹Iâ€‹P2(3Î³2I2Î½~2+24Î³2I2P2Î²~2+24Î³2I2P2ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬[âˆ¥âˆ‡f(ğ±t0)âˆ¥2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}IP}{2}\left(3\gamma^{2}I^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{t_{0}})\right\|^{2}\right]\right.
+3Î³2IPÏƒ2[Ï2+16â€‹P(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])\displaystyle\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\quad\left.+3\gamma^{2}IP\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}\right]-\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹L2â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ22\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}L}{2}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}LIP\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}}{2}
=ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]+9â€‹Î³3â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]+\frac{9\gamma^{3}\eta L^{2}I^{2}P}{2}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹(3â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹Î½~2+24â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹Î²~2+3â€‹Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+16â€‹Pâ€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])3ğ›¾ğœ‚superscriptğ¿2ğ¼ğ‘ƒ23superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğ¼2superscript~ğœˆ224superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğ¼2superscriptğ‘ƒ2superscript~ğ›½23superscriptğ›¾2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğœ2delimited-[]superscriptğœŒ216ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}IP}{2}\left(3\gamma^{2}I^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+3\gamma^{2}IP\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹(1âˆ’72â€‹Î³2â€‹L2â€‹I2â€‹P2)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{2}\left(1-72\gamma^{2}L^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}\right]
âˆ’(Î³â€‹Î·2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâˆ’Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹L2)â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‘t=t0t0+Pâˆ’1âˆ‘n=1Nqtnâ€‹âˆ‘i=0Iâˆ’1âˆ‡Fnâ€‹(ğ²t,in)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad-\left(\frac{\gamma\eta}{2IP}-\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}L}{2}\right)\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\sum_{t={t_{0}}}^{{t_{0}}+P-1}\sum_{n=1}^{N}q_{t}^{n}\sum_{i=0}^{I-1}\nabla F_{n}(\mathbf{y}^{n}_{t,i})\right\|^{2}\right]
+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ22superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğœŒ2superscriptğœ22\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}LIP\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}}{2}
â‰¤ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]+9â€‹Î³3â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]+\frac{9\gamma^{3}\eta L^{2}I^{2}P}{2}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹(3â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹Î½~2+24â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹Î²~2+3â€‹Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+16â€‹Pâ€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])3ğ›¾ğœ‚superscriptğ¿2ğ¼ğ‘ƒ23superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğ¼2superscript~ğœˆ224superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğ¼2superscriptğ‘ƒ2superscript~ğ›½23superscriptğ›¾2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğœ2delimited-[]superscriptğœŒ216ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}IP}{2}\left(3\gamma^{2}I^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+3\gamma^{2}IP\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2âˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P4â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}-\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{4}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}\right]
+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ22superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğœŒ2superscriptğœ22\displaystyle\quad+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}LIP\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}}{2}

where the last inequality is because Î³â‰¤112â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pğ›¾112ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒ\gamma\leq\frac{1}{12LIP} thus âˆ’(1âˆ’72â€‹Î³2â€‹L2â€‹I2â€‹P2)â‰¤âˆ’12172superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğ¿2superscriptğ¼2superscriptğ‘ƒ212-(1-72\gamma^{2}L^{2}I^{2}P^{2})\leq-\frac{1}{2}, and Î³â€‹Î·â‰¤1Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pğ›¾ğœ‚1ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒ\gamma\eta\leq\frac{1}{LIP} thus 1Iâ€‹Pâˆ’Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Lâ‰¥01ğ¼ğ‘ƒğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¿0\frac{1}{IP}-\gamma\eta L\geq 0.

Rearranging, we have

Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹P4â€‹ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]\displaystyle\frac{\gamma\eta IP}{4}\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}\right]
â‰¤ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0)]âˆ’ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[fâ€‹(ğ±t0+P)]+9â€‹Î³3â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹(6â€‹Iâ€‹Î½~2+Ïƒ2â€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2))\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right]-\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}+P})\right]+\frac{9\gamma^{3}\eta L^{2}I^{2}P}{2}\left(6I\tilde{\nu}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹L2â€‹Iâ€‹P2â€‹(3â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹Î½~2+24â€‹Î³2â€‹I2â€‹P2â€‹Î²~2+3â€‹Î³2â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ïƒ2â€‹[Ï2+16â€‹Pâ€‹(1âˆ’âˆ‘n=1N(qtn)2)])3ğ›¾ğœ‚superscriptğ¿2ğ¼ğ‘ƒ23superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğ¼2superscript~ğœˆ224superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğ¼2superscriptğ‘ƒ2superscript~ğ›½23superscriptğ›¾2ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğœ2delimited-[]superscriptğœŒ216ğ‘ƒ1superscriptsubscriptğ‘›1ğ‘superscriptsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ‘›2\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta L^{2}IP}{2}\left(3\gamma^{2}I^{2}\tilde{\nu}^{2}+24\gamma^{2}I^{2}P^{2}\tilde{\beta}^{2}+3\gamma^{2}IP\sigma^{2}\left[\rho^{2}+\frac{1}{6P}\left(1-\sum_{n=1}^{N}(q_{t}^{n})^{2}\right)\right]\right)
+3â€‹Î³â€‹Î·â€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Î´~2â€‹(P)2+Î³2â€‹Î·2â€‹Lâ€‹Iâ€‹Pâ€‹Ï2â€‹Ïƒ22.3ğ›¾ğœ‚ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscript~ğ›¿2ğ‘ƒ2superscriptğ›¾2superscriptğœ‚2ğ¿ğ¼ğ‘ƒsuperscriptğœŒ2superscriptğœ22\displaystyle\quad+\frac{3\gamma\eta IP\tilde{\delta}^{2}(P)}{2}+\frac{\gamma^{2}\eta^{2}LIP\rho^{2}\sigma^{2}}{2}.

Hence,

ğ”¼â‹…|ğ’¬â€‹[â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(ğ±t0)â€–2]\displaystyle\mathbb{E}_{\cdot|\mathcal{Q}}\left[\left\|\nabla f(\mathbf{x}_{{t_{0}}})\right\|^{2}\right]
